scripts.build-all: yarn run build-ui && yarn run build-css
scripts.clean: rm -rf output .spago node_modules && cd css && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build-ui: yarn run build-ui-build && yarn run build-ui-bundle && yarn run build-ui-browserify
scripts.build-ui-bundle: purs bundle output/*/*.js --main Main --module Main -o dist/bundled.js $RTS_ARGS
